ABOUT_COMPONENT.MATUREPOPPY_ALT: Two year old flowerless California Poppy bushes side by side
ABOUT_COMPONENT.GUERRILAGARDENPARKPOPPY_ALT: Two small flowerless California Poppies sprout from the bark in a public park
ABOUT_COMPONENT.POPPYWITHBUMPER_ALT: A small bed of flowerless California Poppies adjacent to a white bumper with red scrapes
ABOUT_COMPONENT.ME_CONTENT: Currently working for SOTA Cloud as a developer, using this project to improve on my stack and skills. I was inspired by my own little native flowerbed I've guerrila garden'd from my landlord. I hope I can inspire you to guerrila garden effectively with my native region mapping so we can drive environmental change :)
ABOUT_COMPONENT.CONTENT: What started as a passion project to deliver native plant info quickly evolved into an over-engineered mess built on delivering the fastest query results possible for native plants using the native geolocation api and SSR. Inspired by the design of McMaster-Carr, I was hoping to deliver public plant info to people with lower internet speeds. Please enjoy the fruits of my labor.
